item.title: Lambda Calculus in the ASF+SDF Meta Environment

content.p: In 1994, Arie van Deursen published Introducing ASF+SDF Using the Lambda-calculus as Example (gzipped Postscript file) in which he presented a specification of the lambda calculus for the ASF+SDF Meta Environment with substitutions, beta conversion, and left-most reductions.

Recently, I tried to use his definitions (gzipped tar file), but they seemed not suitable for the current version of the Meta Environment. Therefore, I revised the definitions so I could use them in version 1.5.3 of the Meta Environment.
Please note that my changes are ad-hoc and not well-tested. In particular, the Let module is not working yet.
Download the definitions in an archive: lambda-calculus.tar.gz
Read the README file for usage instructions.
